name: Cosmopolitan Alchemist
description: A skilled humanoid proficient in potion crafting and alchemical creation, distinguished by a sharp mind and dexterous hands. Often carries a collection of useful potions and explosive bombs.
memorable: Possesses the ability to craft legendary potions and utilizes bombs that can deal heavy area damage.
goals: Support allies through potion crafting and control the battlefield with explosive bombs.
relations: Might serve alongside adventurers or be encountered among other skilled alchemists.
environment: Typically found in laboratories, apothecaries, or alchemical workshops.
strengths: Exceptional intelligence enhances skills in arcana, investigation, and nature; proficient in crafting powerful potions.
weaknesses: Relies on components and requires setup time to create potions.
attacks: Uses a dagger for melee attacks and can deal poison damage, alongside explosive bombs that cause significant fire damage in an area.
most_powerful_ability: Can throw bombs that explode in a large area, causing serious fire damage to multiple targets.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 15, allowing for good awareness of surroundings.
skills: Proficient in arcana, investigation, and nature, allowing for high effectiveness in knowledge-based tasks.
additional_information: Can quickly change bomb damage type with Alter Bomb.
Uses a Desperate Drink reaction for emergency healing.
Resistant to fire and poison damage.
test_queries: adaptable alchemist who uses explosive bombs
